sentence: Among the underlying components of the Russell 3000 index, we saw noteworthy options trading volume today in TPI Composites Inc (Symbol: TPIC), where a total of 1,640 contracts have traded so far, representing approximately 164,000 underlying shares.
That amounts to about 45.6% of TPIC's average daily trading volume over the past month of 359,900 shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $35 strike call option expiring August 16, 2019, with 810 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 81,000 underlying shares of TPIC.

Below is a chart showing TPIC's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $35 strike highlighted in orange:

Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM) saw options trading volume of 23,131 contracts, representing approximately 2.3 million underlying shares or approximately 45.2% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 5.1 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $160 strike call option expiring April 05, 2019, with 1,667 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 166,700 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $160 strike highlighted in orange:

And RPM International Inc (Symbol: RPM) options are showing a volume of 2,755 contracts thus far today.
That number of contracts represents approximately 275,500 underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 44.1% of RPM's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 624,015 shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $60 strike call option expiring April 18, 2019, with 1,775 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 177,500 underlying shares of RPM.

Below is a chart showing RPM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $60 strike highlighted in orange:
